Text: Fai, O Israe̩l, me̩ netirʼo̩la uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ kʼu nako̩ me̩-i, ku me̩ che; todu kʼame̩ ki deju, ku me̩ nyʼo̩mo̩ agba ane̩ ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩ amata-me̩, adu ñwu me̩.
Ame̩ ki butʼo̩la kʼu ñwa ñwu me̩-i n, me̩ ki la bu wane̩ n; kʼame̩ ki de uko̩ Jihofa O̩jo̩-me̩ e-kʼu nañwa ñwu me̩.
Eju-me̩ li e̩wñ ki Jihofa che ugbo o̩la Beal-peo̩r le̩; todu Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ fʼaboke̩le̩ du ku ma tu Beal-peo̩r ubi chile̩che̩ rinyo̩ bʼalumeji-me̩ te̩;
ame̩ ku me̩ muda yamo̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, okoke me̩ du deju tʼeñini.
Go, omi fʼo̩la uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ ko̩ me̩ alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-mi ñwa ñwu mi kʼame̩ ki chʼabe̩le̩ oj ane̩ ugbo kʼame̩ anyi ku me̩ ne̩-i.

Todule̩ me̩ ki de ku me̩ che tʼeju-wñ; todu e-le̩ achʼibe-me̩ kpai oji o̩la ku me̩ ma eju amone̩, ku ma gbo̩ o̩la uhio̩me̩-i du ku ma akakini, Ochochi abo uche̩ichi inaina-i chʼamone̩ ki nʼibe ku ma la mʼoji o̩la gbe̩.
Todu ugbo abo uche̩ichi amone̩ lileʼka de̩, ku ma nʼO̩jo̩ ki me̩ru ma, alu ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ de̩ e̩gba du kʼa kwadʼo̩?
Oñ ugbo abo uche̩ichi lile kʼi nʼo̩la uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ alu kʼuko̩-o̩la-i kʼu nadu te̩ ñwu me̩ eñini-i de̩ taa?

E-i kate, e̩ ki fʼo̩la-we̩ de, kʼe̩ la che̩do̩chacha kʼe̩ fʼonugo-we̩ de, tode̩gba kʼe̩ gbenyo̩ e̩wñ kʼeju-we̩ li, tode̩gba ki akwo bʼef e̩do̩-we̩ te̩ o̩jo̩ udeju-we̩ okate; uwe̩ ki la je̩ ñw amo̩ma-we̩ kpai amo̩ma amo̩ma-we̩ fʼu ma.

O̩jo̩ kʼe̩ dago o̩gba Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ Ho̩re̩b le̩, e̩gba ku Jihofa ka ñwu mi kakini, Fʼamone̩ le̩ do̩ jeju ñwu mi, kʼu naje̩ ñwu ma gbo̩ o̩la-mi, kʼama ki ko̩che̩ erailo mi o̩jo̩ du ku ma deju ile̩-i, kʼama ki ño̩ ko̩ amo̩ma-ma abe̩le̩ ge̩.
Tak ame̩ te̩wa dago e̩re̩ uwo le̩, oñ una najo uwo le̩ gbogbo tʼo̩ge̩ge̩de̩ efojale, kʼe̩chubi kpai akpa kpai e̩chubi gbe̩m du te̩.
Taki Jihofa ko̩la ñwu me̩ kwef alumeji una le̩; ame̩ gbo̩ omu uko̩la, me̩ muda li alu kʼi de̩ n; chai omuko̩la kate do̩mo̩.
Tak I dʼo̩la alo-wñ kʼi kpe̩ kajane̩ ñwu me̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi ñwa ñwu me̩ ku me̩ che, owñ chʼo̩la me̩gwa le̩; oñ i fʼu ko̩ nyʼalo okuta meji.
Taki Jihofa ñwa ñwu mi iko le̩ kʼu ko̩ me̩ o̩la uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩, kʼame̩ ki che teju-wñ oj ane̩ ugbo ku me̩ adaba nyi ku me̩ ne̩ le̩.
Todule̩ me̩ nafʼo̩la-me̩ de nyo̩nyo̩. Todu me̩ li alu kʼi de̩ eju o̩jo̩ ki Jihofa ko̩la ñwu me̩ Ho̩re̩b kwef alumeji una le̩ re n,
nago, tode̩gba ku me̩ kpa o̩la-me̩ bie̩, ku me̩ chane̩ eda ojibo ki biu e̩wñʼka, dagba i biu o̩ko̩ abe̩k o̩ya,
dagba i biu e̩la abe̩re̩me̩le̩ kʼa dʼile̩ʼka, dagba i biu e̩we̩ʼka kʼi nʼika kʼi awu ojale,
dagba i biu e̩wñ kʼi afa ane̩pe̩te̩ʼka, dagba i biu e̩ja kʼi dʼef omi o̩gane̩ ile̩-iʼka;

tode̩gba kʼuwe̩ achi eju-we̩ nyʼojale kʼe̩ fʼolu abe̩k ochu abe̩k awo awo li, owñ chʼe̩wñ uwewe ojale le̩, ku ma fʼuwe̩ fa ubi kʼe̩ dojikane̩ ñwu ma, kʼe̩ re̩ e̩wñ ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ kpe̩ ñw amone̩ du kʼi dʼo̩gane̩ ojale-i.
Ama Jihofa mʼume̩ ko, oñ i ko me̩ kwef aido ebije le̩ dufu, owñ chʼakwʼIjipti, kʼame̩ ki chʼamone̩ ki chʼe̩wñ ogu kʼi aje̩, alu ki de̩ eñini-i.
Anubile̩ ge̩, Jihofa we̩do̩rʼumi todu me̩, oñ i fu go̩ ka kʼomi adaba Jo̩rdan in, kʼomi ma anyi oj ane̩ ki nyo̩ e-ki Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩ adu ñw e̩ kʼe̩ je̩ le̩ n.
Eku naku oj ane̩-i, nadaba Jo̩rdan in; ame̩ muda adaba, me̩ la agbʼane̩ ki nyo̩ le̩.
Me̩ fʼo̩la-me̩ de, tode̩gba ku me̩ gbenyo̩ alo Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, owñ chʼe-kʼi kpe̩ kpai ame̩ taku me̩ fʼojibo bo̩ ki dab e̩wñʼka ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, funaba ñw e̩ le̩.
Todu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, chʼuna kʼi afʼe̩wñ lie̩, O̩jo̩ ajogu i che.

E̩gba kʼuwe̩ abi amo̩ma, kpai amaaju, kʼame̩ la kpo̩kpe̩ oj ane̩ le̩, ku me̩ kpa o̩la-me̩ bie̩ ku me̩ la da ojibo kʼi biu e̩wñʼka, kʼame̩ la fʼe̩wñ e̩bie̩ne̩ che eju Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ nyʼu uwe̩do̩;

nado̩ efojale kpai ile̩-i ku ma gba ibenu nyʼume̩ eñini-i, ka kʼelenyo̩ ame̩ alenyo̩ bʼane̩ le̩ te̩ hioko faifai, owñ chʼugbo ku me̩ adaba Jo̩rdan anyi kʼame̩ ki ne̩ le̩; ame̩ akwojolugbo o̩mo̩ n, me̩ muda achile̩che̩ rinyo̩ hioko.
Jihofa la akpa me̩ tuka rʼef amone̩ amone̩, tak ame̩ abo rere ef abo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ugbo ki Jihofa ane̩ me̩ nyi.
O̩mo̩ me̩ la are̩ amo̩jo̩ oli kpai okuta kʼo̩wo̩ one̩ che, e-kʼi ma la gane̩ n, i la gbʼo̩la n, i la aje̩ e̩wñ n, i la gbulu n.
Me̩ muda ajʼo̩mo̩ atejane̩ Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, tak uwe̩ ali owñ, owñ chʼe̩gba kʼe̩ nʼe̩do̩-we̩ chaka kpai onugo-we̩ chaka tejane̩-wñ.
E̩gba kʼuwe̩ dʼef o̩pe̩cha-we̩, kʼe̩wñ-i du lewa bʼuwe̩ ma, e̩gba o̩jo̩ otitala, uwe̩ adabi wʼugbo Jihofa O̩jo̩-we̩, kʼe̩ la anetiru omuko̩la-wñ,
todu Jihofa, O̩jo̩-we̩, chʼO̩jo̩ kʼi ali ejumomi one̩; i adeyakpʼuwe̩ n, i la akpʼuwe̩ bie̩ rinyo̩ n, i agbenyo̩ alo kʼi go̩ ñw amata-we̩ le̩ n.

Todu e̩ natene o̩la o̩jo̩ ki lale fai ta, e-ki do̩mo̩ o̩gba taku ma bi we̩, akwe̩gba kʼO̩jo̩ nyi one̩ ile̩-i, e̩ natene kwo ukpoji ojaleʼka gbogbo tʼukpoji-wñ ekeji, e̩wñ inaina e̩go̩-i do̩mo̩ mama me̩? abe̩ku ma gbʼinabali e̩wñʼka kʼi dab owñ?
One̩ gbo̩ omuko̩la O̩jo̩ kʼi dʼalumeji una ako̩la, alu kʼuwe̩ gbo̩ le̩, kʼe̩ne̩ le̩ deju ta?

Abe̩k O̩jo̩ʼka che kʼi nyʼako abo uche̩ichiʼka kwʼalumeji abo uche̩ichi omune̩, lugbo ejama, kpʼujiwe, kpʼe̩wñ uno̩ eche, kpai ogu eja, kpai o̩wo̩ ki gbiti, kpai o̩wo̩ kʼi nadala te̩, kpai e̩wñ ubailo inaina, alu ki Jihofa, O̩jo̩-me̩, che ñwu me̩ Ijipti eju-me̩ meji-i chaka?
Ma dʼe-le̩ ñʼuwe̩, kʼuwe̩ ki ma ka ki Jihofa chʼO̩jo̩; i nʼomune̩ tʼowñ le n.
I je̩ ñw e̩ gbo̩ omuko̩la-wñ kwʼefojale; todu kʼi kʼuwe̩ o̩la; i ño̩ je̩ ñw e̩ li una-wñ inaina ile̩-i, uwe̩ la gbo̩ o̩la kʼi ka alumeji una le̩.
Oñ todabu kʼi fe̩do̩ amata-we̩, i la mʼugbe̩-ma ko ñw o̩la-wñ ubi-ma ge̩, eju-wñ dʼane̩ oñ i nʼukpahiu-wñ ki nana dʼe̩ kwʼIjipti dufu,
i la fʼabo uche̩ichi uche̩ichi ki wewe ki ño̩ gbiti tʼuwe̩ le ne dufu rʼo̩gba-we̩, kʼi dʼuwe̩ wʼejefu-i, kʼi mʼane̩-ma ko ñw e̩ kʼi mud e̩wñ ogu kʼe̩ je̩, alu ki de̩ eñini-i.
Todule̩ e̩ ki ma eñini kide̩, kʼe̩ la mʼu gba tʼe̩do̩, kakini, Jihofa, owñ le̩ chʼO̩jo̩ efojale ate̩-i, kpai ane̩-ile̩ o̩gane̩-i; omune̩ du do̩mo̩ n.
Todule̩ uwe̩ ki de uhio̩me̩-wñ kpai uko̩-wñ, kʼomi añwa ñw e̩ eñini-i, todu ki ra ñw e̩, kpai amo̩ma-we̩ ubi-we̩ ge̩, kʼuwe̩ ki kwojolugbo oj ane̩ e-ki Jihofa adu ñw e̩-i o̩jo̩ du.
Taku Mose̩s fʼewo me̩ta date̩ o̩wo̩ olodudu ejudaba Jo̩rdan,
todu kʼe̩ne̩ kʼi akpʼone̩ kʼi ra nyʼomo̩, owñ chʼe̩ne̩ kʼi fʼekeji-wñ kpa kʼi ma gwejugede n, kʼi ma la chʼulaka-wñ akwo ubi n, todu kʼi ra nyʼewo-iʼka kʼi deju.
Ewo le̩ che Bize̩r ane̩ egbili chʼutod abo Rube̩n, Ramo̩t-gilead chʼutod abo Gad, Golan Beshan la chʼutod abo Manasa.
E-i la chʼuko̩-o̩la ki Mose̩s ko jo̩ ñw abo Israe̩l;
abo-i chʼo̩la ibenu kpai uhio̩me̩ kpai oji ajo̩ e-ki Mose̩s ka jane̩ ñw amo̩ma Israe̩l e̩gba ku ma kwʼ Ijipti dufu wa
ejudaba Jo̩rdan, ef o̩go̩ ki dʼiba Be̩t-peo̩r, oj ane̩ Siho̩n, onu abo Amo̩r, kʼi dodo He̩shbo̩n e-ki Mose̩s kpai amo̩ma Israe̩l gwo ma da, e̩gba ku ma kwʼane̩ Ijipti dufu wa le̩.
Taku ma mʼane̩-wñ gba ku ma ne̩, kpai ane̩ O̩g onu Beshan, amonu abo Amo̩r ku ma jʼudaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu le̩;
akwo Aroe̩r, ki dʼotete ukpolo Amo̩n, gbogbo wa uwo Zayo̩n (e-le̩ che He̩rmo̩n),
manyʼo̩chaka ane̩ Araba kʼi dʼudaba Jo̩rdan o̩wo̩ olodudu, gbogbo wa ohimini Araba ki dʼe̩re̩ Pisga.
